entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
